review: I all of a sudden have these all over the place. 2 in my office and 3 in the house. Mirroring any Apple device on the TV is great. In the office I share work on my TV or TV in the conference room. At home mostly Netflix plus some other channels. Also great to throw up pictures. Great to mirror TV stations from websites you don't get from your provider such as the local news station during a storm which I do not get on DirecTV. iTunes Radio, etc. This gives you a small taste of where TV is probably going in the future.

review: This thing is great!  Has lots of features and was fairly simple to connect.  Some things to know, though.  You should go to itunes and download the free Remote for iOS app before setting it all up.  Also the way to "mirror" what you see on your ipad is supported by enabling the Home Sharing section under the Computer icon on apple tv.  Also, in order to see your control for Airplay on your ipad place your finger on the bottom of your screen and swipe up fast and it'll bring up your Airplay control panel so you can start mirroring things from the device to the TV.  I realize most Apple people already know this but it took me a long time to research all this out! Hope this helps someone else.
